content: add a burst of spring to your home with this easy beginner-friendly crochet tulip coaster pattern perfect for teatime valentine s day or mother s day **materials** ▢lily sugar n cream yarn - hot green ▢lily sugar n cream yarn - country red ▢4 5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase
